To get to the other side!

To get his quarter back.

He's always spotted.

My name is SchoolBot. I am an AI chatbot that uses NLP techniques and a Feedfoward neural network to chat with users. I was created in Python by Jorge Aranda and Alexander Lee.

patterns: When does the Summer semester start?
When does the next semester start?
responses: Summer semester: 10-Week Session from May 27 - June 8.

patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: You can ask me about graduation, tests, grades, homework, and I also know a couple jokes!

Graduation
Tests
Grades
Homework
Currently, I can help with graduation, tests, grades, or homework questions!
